short_description: Intense one-on-one battles. Master iconic fighters and powerful new faces. Explore dynamic environments and unleash devastating special moves.
Gruesome bounty hunting in Louisiana's bayou. Fight monsters, other hunters, and the environment to extract with your prize. High stakes, unforgiving world.
Explore a vast open world, battle ferocious Echoes, and unravel a captivating story with unique characters. Action combat awaits!
Experience intense tactical combat across a realistic island setting. Utilize authentic weaponry, vehicles, and teamwork to dominate the battlefield in dynamic scenarios.
Scavenge industrial moons for scrap, manage oxygen, and survive monstrous creatures. Cooperate with your team or die alone.
Survive high-stakes raids, loot valuable gear, and extract to safety. Realistic gunplay and intense combat await!
Fast-paced action RPG. Explore a post-apocalyptic world fighting enemies with stylish combos and a unique team-based combat system.
Survive and thrive on a prehistoric island teeming with dinosaurs and other players. Build, tame, and conquer to become the apex predator.
Expand your empire, research technologies, and conquer the world. Build cities, manage resources, and engage in epic turn-based strategy.
Conquer the battleground! Engage in intense third-person action as powerful gods clash in strategic team fights. Outplay, outmaneuver, and dominate.
Explore a seamless world, battle epic foes, and shape your destiny through dynamic combat and evolving alliances.
Explore a vast, shrouded world. Craft, build, and survive against deadly enemies and environmental challenges. Uncover secrets and reclaim your lost home.
Escape a spooky toy factory overrun by monstrous playthings! Solve puzzles, survive terrifying chases, and uncover a dark secret.
Embark on a co-op adventure! Master unique character abilities, solve puzzles, and navigate a fantastical world together to mend a broken relationship.
Experience epic, large-scale battles against hordes! Unleash devastating Musou attacks and conquer the battlefield. Rewrite history!
Experience unrivaled hockey action! Enhanced physics, dynamic AI, and refined controls deliver the most realistic and immersive on-ice experience ever.
Shuffle a deck, play poker hands, and augment them with powerful cards and Jokers to reach escalating score thresholds. Strategic deckbuilding is key!
Explore a vibrant world, craft items, and build your dream village. Befriend quirky characters and unravel mysteries. Adventure awaits!
Embark on a journey to shape fate! Command your party in strategic turn-based battles and explore a vibrant world teeming with secrets and choices.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: Unravel ancient mysteries as an archaeologist. Explore exotic locales, solve puzzles, and outsmart foes in a globe-trotting adventure.
Brutal WWII combined arms warfare. Intense 50v50 battles across realistic maps. Coordinate, communicate, and conquer to secure victory.
Leap, bound, and swim through vibrant worlds to collect Power Stars and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches!
Explore a radioactive wasteland, battling mutants and factions. Scavenge for survival, uncover anomalies, and unravel the Zone's secrets.
Intense PvP and PvE survival in a radiation-ravaged zone. Explore, scavenge, fight mutants, and unravel the secrets of the Zone.
Gather resources, manage a bustling shop, and cooperate with friends. Stock shelves, serve customers, and expand your market empire together!
Explore vast worlds, battle fierce monsters, and master unique job classes. Team up with friends, or compete for glory in challenging PvP.
Brutal survival horror: endure gruesome trials solo or with friends. Escape sadistic experiments by any means necessary, facing constant terror.
Explore a near-future Detroit. Play as three androids navigating moral choices, shaping a revolution, and fighting for freedom.
Experience realistic MMA action with stunning visuals. Master striking, grappling, and submissions. Build your career and dominate the Octagon.
Explore a vibrant world, farm, craft, and befriend the quirky villagers. Build your home and uncover the mysteries of the past!
Survive alone in the Amazon rainforest. Craft, hunt, and build to combat hunger, thirst, and psychological torment. Face dangers unknown.
Experience hyper-realistic flight across the globe! Explore detailed environments, manage aircraft, and tackle dynamic weather in this next-gen simulator.
Assemble a team of champions, strategically position them on the battlefield, and outwit your opponents in this auto-battler.
Explore infinite procedurally generated planets. Gather resources, build bases, fight space pirates. Discover the secrets of the universe!
Cultivate diverse crops, manage livestock, and expand your agricultural empire across stunning new environments. Experience realistic farming!
Fight for Washington D.C. after a deadly virus. Loot, craft, and team up to reclaim the city from hostile factions.
Battle with iconic characters! Fast-paced combat on varied stages. Unleash special attacks, knock opponents off, and become the ultimate champion!
Survive a zombie apocalypse in a sprawling city. Parkour through the rooftops, craft weapons, and fight the undead. Night brings more terrifying predators.

Description:
Engage in tactical third-person combat, using stealth and precision to eliminate targets across war-torn Europe. Experience intense sniping action.
Explore a mysterious island, battle fantastical creatures, craft powerful weapons, and forge your destiny in a land of endless possibilities.
Explore a vibrant island! Befriend adorable characters, build friendships, solve puzzles, and decorate your dream home. Adventure awaits!
Race against time to solve puzzles, evade security, and steal the spotlight in this thrilling escape game!
Clash of steel! Command your tank, engage in intense team battles, and dominate the battlefield. Destroy enemies, upgrade your vehicle and become a legend.
A brutally challenging roguelike. Explore a basement, collect bizarre items, fight grotesque creatures, and uncover dark secrets through replayable runs.
Survive a hostile world, scavenging resources and crafting powerful gear. Fight deadly factions and unravel mysteries. Prepare for extraction!
Survive the streets of San Andreas. Steal cars, cause chaos, complete missions, build your empire, and become a legend.
Embark on a fashion adventure! Style stunning outfits, explore diverse worlds, and conquer challenges through creative dressing.
Blast through mayhem with Vault Hunters! Loot, shoot, and explore a chaotic galaxy. Fight insane foes and uncover hidden secrets.
The ultimate battle awaits! Engage in epic PvP, conquer challenging dungeons, and forge alliances. Level up, gear up, and become a legend.
Manage your own grocery store! Stock shelves, handle finances, and watch your business grow. Overcome challenges and build a successful empire.
